title: Couple With Heart Woman Person Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Person and Man Holding Hands with Heart
description: Represents a romantic couple with a person of light skin tone and a man of dark skin tone, united by a heart symbol. It signifies love, romance, and diverse relationships.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this heartwarming emoji portrays a couple, a woman with a light skin tone and a person with a dark skin tone, united by a floating heart. Apple’s signature 3D shading and smooth gradients lend a soft, loving aura to their interaction, with subtle highlights on their faces conveying tenderness. The heart itself glows with a gentle luminescence, a symbol of their shared affection, making this a beautiful way to express romantic love and partnership.
